entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community – Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.

entry.title: July 25th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: Earlier this week, we released World Update XVII: United Kingdom & Ireland. This update includes 16 TIN cities, 79 Points of interest (POIs), and 5 handcrafted airports. As with all World Updates, it is available to download for FREE from the in-sim Marketplace.

entry.title: August 1st, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: For simmers in the Northern Hemisphere, July and August are frequent vacation months. To anyone currently enjoying time off work or school, we wish you a happy and restful break! We hope you’re able to enjoy some quality time in the virtual skies of Microsoft Flight Simulator!

entry.title: August 8th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: Earlier today, we released a small update which contains the latest navdata and another round of improved airports from community members participating in the World Hub closed alpha test. You can see the full notes, including a list of every updated airport, on our forums here.

entry.title: August 15th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: A few days from now we will celebrate the fourth anniversary of the release of Microsoft Flight Simulator on August 18, 2020. From all of us on the team, we want to share a message of sincere gratitude to everyone in the flight sim community for making the last four years truly special.
